alert.note: Alert for Macon; Robertson; Sumner (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 24 at 11:13PM CDT until March 24 at 11:45PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Sumner County in Middle Tennessee... Northwestern Macon County in Middle Tennessee... Northeastern Robertson County in Middle Tennessee... * Until 1145 PM CDT. * At 1112 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles northwest of Portland to 6 miles north of Hendersonville, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Gallatin, White House, Westmoreland, Portland, Orlinda, Mitchellville, Cottontown, Bethpage and Oak Grove. This includes Interstate 65 between mile markers 116 and 120. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
